from@ g|fastapi|n import@ g|FastAPI|n, f|Query|n
from@ g|fastapi|n.g|middleware|n.g|cors |n import@ g|CORSMiddleware|n
from@ g|pydantic|n import@ g|BaseModel|n
import@ g|Preprocessor|n
import@ g|TaskMaster|n

s|app|n = g|FastAPI|n()

s|app|n.f|add_middleware|n(g|Preprocessor|n.s|CORSMiddleware|n)

classe g|ImageData|n(g|BaseModel|n):
	s|form|n: g|str|n
	s|img |n: g|str|n

@s|app|n.f|get|n(s'/api/imageConverter'n)
def read_root/(s|data|n: g|ImageData|n):
	s|src|n = g|TaskMaster|n.f|convert_img |n(s|data|n.s|img |n, s|data|n.s|form|n)
	return@ g|Responce|n.f|model|n(s|src|n, g|Preprocessor|n.f|timeStamp|n())
